title: Looking at getting into coaching (unpaid) (Gold and lower)
body:
Hey guys I am Havoc and I am looking at getting into / doing some coaching. 
This service will be free as I am looking to get into and try coaching.

I am a Plat 3 JNG main but can offer coaching in other roles.
Weekly I compete in Platinum tournaments and have several wins under my belt.
I managed two Gold tournament teams organizing scrims and also helping them draft in their games.

Able to coach gold and under.

Lessons will be a mixture of VOD reviews, In game analysis and theory crafting to be able to help you to the best of my ability

Any more information please contact me :)

IGN - ItsHavoc
Discord - Havoc#4859
